values: The next thing that happened chronologically was me having atrip to monaghan, but the pictures that were promised never reached my mommy Nodis, so I don`t have documentation :( Then I got my with the nicest box you can think of : make your own picture: they were the best present ever and I spend lost of time sending thankful, warm thoughts to the people that gave them to me
http://blaues-kind.livejournal.com/3064.html

oh jeez , so much has happened in the past half year and yet I didn`t post. My appologies. But still , pictures were taken and we try to keep it timewise right ... So the first pics that are going up are ... Nodises flat... well, the first one, we lived in , as we moved again.... yup , told ya , a lot has happened... Now this is the first flat we lived in, after we left uncle Alan`s house : we start with the bed: computer ... can you see us at all ? ;p window ... or another "where is the puppet" pic: bookcorner trying to open cuppboard: `ello found the booze please don`t cook me ! safer spot ? or here ? if I can get in here, I`m definitely safe :) sockhunger and boots as desert hanging out to digest between the towels `ello again in sync ;p dirty bastard like me needs a shower after the dirt is gone, I`m much lighter : em and now ... leave me alone ;p
http://blaues-kind.livejournal.com/2761.html

After my mom didn`t bring me to London this time (I`m still mad with her), I demanded night out in Dominion two weeks ago... Was a bit shy in the beginning, not having been among crowds for a while... But mom built up my courage a little So I took the piss out of uncle Alan and flirted a little with mela, who I`m not sure of, if she liked me, what you think ? So in the end I took a swing with Lapdancing Jesus and all was good :)
http://blaues-kind.livejournal.com/2477.html

BTW you also have to blame Mama for not bringing me out a lot and even leaving me at home, when she went to visit her folks... But I`ve been over to London recently and here is (part of) the rare Been on the tube for the first time.. little scary ... loud and soooo deep down... But Mama helped me to forget my shyness and look over the bag So I cheered up and rode the pig in Camden After that I needed a rest before I started the nightlife with booze
http://blaues-kind.livejournal.com/2169.html

It`s been ... well, quite a while... and you have to blame Mama for that. But finally : Here I am with lil girl that I attrachted already, when we left the bus in Derry. Bit too young for my taste, but I`m always happy when I can attrackt any one Now this was more the age I was looking for and hell, he liked me ... ... he even left me this : I needed a fag and after a relaxing beer I went on with the girls... ... oh giggidy Derry was a score
http://blaues-kind.livejournal.com/1995.html

http://blaues-kind.livejournal.com/1568.html

Hehehe, didn`t say which Monday, did I ;P At first, I was a bit shy But then I saw the cute girls And they loved me As well as the guys We had lots of fun and they asked me, if I wanted to try something new ... I was curious and insecure, but then... I decided new experiences might be exciting... So I tried the girls And the boys And even the kink Until I didn`t know, what was up and down anymore I needed booze ! And so ended a dunken night of fun Tired I curled up with my only true love - TIGGER Yeah - MY ARSE ... GIIIIIIRRRRRRLS ;P ... (I have decided not screen the heads of all the people, so if you are offended by appearing here, tell me and I`ll take yor picture out) And um yeah, I was in Derry as well, but those pictures are still on the camera and will take even some more time ;P
http://blaues-kind.livejournal.com/1369.html

Eph BIG BBQ yesterday... all hungover right now but I had shitloads of fun...
Have to leave for Derry soon though, thats why update with pictures etc. , wont be up here before Monday...
All I can tell is that I have sooo many new friends and much more new experiences ;P
http://blaues-kind.livejournal.com/930.html

So , now that my mommy1 is gone I miss her.
On Saturday I have been to Dominion again. There were a lot of people laughing at me. I think I like goths. They are so friendly and the chicks ... *giggedy giggedy* (hehe, I learned that phrase very fast, didn`t I ;P )
I think I will have to get some new outfits for clubbing... I will ask Mom2, what she thinks :)

Mom1 had to say goodby to many people that evening and mom2 was dancing a lot. She was chained up and so was not really able to hold me a lot, but my new friend Liam from Derry looked well after me :)
There seemed to be many goodbyes at night, when we left and so it took quite a while until we were able to make our way to the airport. But hey, at least I boobgrabbed a hot American chick that was about to leave as well ...
There I spent my last hours with Mom2, had bad mocha and finally had to leave her to her flight. All sad , but Mom2 hugged me a lot in the taxi back to my new home and now here I am.

Yesterday I spend mainly sleeping and relaxing and got more hugs so I wouldn`t get too miserable.
Mom2 told me that this evening a really cute Canadian chick is coming over and I`m really looking forward to it :) ... oh and on the next weekend I`ll go up to Derry with Mom2, uncle Alan and Canadian and will see my friend Liam again and rock around :)
http://blaues-kind.livejournal.com/748.html

I'm one and a half years old and I've grown up a lot since then, which is not too amazing, considering my moms' weirdness. During <lj user="silke_germany">'s time in Ireland I was allowed to go out into a "night club" for the first time in my life. They obviously took me to the Domnion, where I got my first real kiss from R.! It was great!
Now I'm really sad because my mom No.1 is flying back to Germany tonight and she doesn't know, when she'll be able to come back to Ireland for a visit or if and when my Mom No.2 will be able to go to someplace in Germany near to where she lives. So I guess a lot oof phone calls will be necessary so I don't miss my Mom No.1 too much. 
But I'm also quite happy because I get to spend a lot of time with Mom No.2, <lj user="nodis"> and uncle <lj user="alan_ie">.
http://blaues-kind.livejournal.com/501.html
